short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily displays a new Calvin & Hobbes comic everyday

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first ever Calvin and Hobbes strip was published on November 18, 1985. Daily has been developed to celebrate the 30th anniversary of Calvin and Hobbes. Daily gives a new comic strip mapped to the current date 30 years back. Install and enjoy a Christmas comic on Christmas and a New Year's comic on New Year's :)

Thanks a lot to Bill Watterson for Calvin and Hobbes, it makes my day :D
